title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes note of what Aaron Rodgers said about the Packers losing streak and why he isn't helping the situation. He discusses a new report saying Broncos first year head coach Nathaniel Hackett is already in danger of getting fired after a disastrous season with new quarterback Russell Wilson. He believes the Lakers have made a major mistake keeping Russell Westbrook as his poor performances have carried over into the new season. Plus, New York Times Best Selling Author Jeff Pearlman joins the show in studio to share stories from his new book “The Last Folk Hero: The Life and Myth of Bo Jackson”.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
